description: Largest value of k for which Golay-Rudin-Shapiro sequence A020986(k) = n.
references: J. Brillhart and P. Morton, A case study in mathematical research: the Golay-Rudin-Shapiro sequence, Amer. Math. Monthly, 103 (1996) 854-869.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_; further extended by _David W. Wilson_, June 1997
